name: Mega Mecha City Destroyer RPG
description:
Find your mech and burn the city in this complex, full of plot twists and romances video game of all time.

Key features:

-Customize your avatar
-A lot of different statistics let you customize your character in numerous ways
- your choices matters

 Controlls: A/D to move, space to jump

Temat Jamu: "Wbrew oczekiwaniom"

Team:

Radosław Klasa
Dorian Cichoszewski
Przemysław Niemczyk
Olek Kempski
